And <S%G2532><s%> Kept Back <S%G3557><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Value, <S%G5092><s%> Being Aware Of <S%G4894><s%> It Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Wife <S%G1135><s%> , His, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Brought <S%G5342><s%> A Certain <S%G3313><s%> Part <S%G5100><s%> At <S%G3844><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Feet <S%G4228><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Apostles <S%G652><s%> Laid It. <S%G5087><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> But Said <S%G1161><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> Ananias, <S%G367><s%> <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> Did Fill <S%G4137><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> Thy <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Heart, <S%G4675><s%> To Lie To <S%G5574><s%> For Thee <S%G4571><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy, <S%G40><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Keep Back <S%G3557><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Value <S%G5092><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Estate? <S%G5564><s%>

Not <S%G3780><s%> Remaining <S%G3306><s%> To Thee Did <S%G4671><s%> It Remain? <S%G3306><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Been Sold, <S%G4097><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Thine <S%G3588><s%> Own <S%G4674><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> Was It <S%G5225><s%> <S%G5101><s%> Not ? Why <S%G3754><s%> Didst Thou Purpose <S%G5087><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Thy <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Heart <S%G4675><s%> This <S%G3588><s%> Thing? <S%G4229><s%> Thou <S%G5124><s%> Didst <S%G3756><s%> Not Lie <S%G5574><s%> To Men, <S%G444><s%> But <S%G235><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G191><s%> And Hearing <S%G1161><s%> Ananias <S%G367><s%> These <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3056><s%> Words, <S%G5128><s%> Falling Down <S%G4098><s%> Expired. <S%G1634><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Came <S%G1096><s%> Fear <S%G5401><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Heard <S%G191><s%> These Things. <S%G5023><s%>

<S%G450><s%> And Having Risen <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Younger Men <S%G3501><s%> Swathed <S%G4958><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Carried Out <S%G1627><s%> Buried Him. <S%G2290><s%>

<S%G1096><s%> And It Came To Pass <S%G1161><s%> About <S%G5613><s%> Hours <S%G5610><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> Afterwards <S%G1292><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Wife, <S%G1135><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Knowing <S%G1492><s%> What <S%G3588><s%> Had Come To Pass, <S%G1096><s%> Came In. <S%G1525><s%>

<S%G611><s%> And Answered <S%G1161><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> Tell <S%G2036><s%> Me <S%G3427><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> For So Much <S%G5118><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Estate <S%G5564><s%> Ye Sold? <S%G591><s%> And <S%G3588><s%> She <S%G1161><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Yes, <S%G3483><s%> For So Much. <S%G5118><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Her, <S%G846><s%> Why Is It <S%G5101><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G4856><s%> Ye Agreed Together <S%G5213><s%> To Tempt <S%G3985><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Of The Lord? <S%G2962><s%> , Lo, <S%G2400><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Feet <S%G4228><s%> Of Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Buried <S%G2290><s%> Thy <S%G3588><s%> <S%G435><s%> Husband <S%G4675><s%> Are At <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Door, <S%G2374><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Shall Carry Out <S%G1627><s%> Thee. <S%G4571><s%>

<S%G4098><s%> And She Fell Down <S%G1161><s%> Immediately <S%G3916><s%> At <S%G3844><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Feet <S%G4228><s%> His <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Expired. <S%G1634><s%> <S%G1525><s%> And Having Come In <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Young Men <S%G3495><s%> Found <S%G2147><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> Dead; <S%G3498><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Carried Out <S%G1627><s%> They Buried Her <S%G2290><s%> By <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Husband. <S%G435><s%> Her <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Came <S%G1096><s%> Fear <S%G5401><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Assembly, <S%G1577><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Heard <S%G191><s%> These Things. <S%G5023><s%>

And <S%G1223><s%> By <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Apostles <S%G652><s%> Came To Pass <S%G1096><s%> Signs <S%G4592><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wonders <S%G5059><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> Many; <S%G4183><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> They Were <S%G2258><s%> With One Accord <S%G3661><s%> All <S%G537><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Porch <S%G4745><s%> Of Solomon, <S%G4672><s%>

But Of <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G1161><s%> Rest <S%G3062><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> Durst <S%G5111><s%> Join <S%G2853><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Magnified <S%G3170><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People; <S%G2992><s%>

The More <S%G3123><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Were Added <S%G4369><s%> Believers <S%G4100><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Multitudes <S%G4128><s%> <S%G435><s%> Both Of Men <S%G5037><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Women; <S%G1135><s%>

So As <S%G5620><s%> In <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Streets <S%G4113><s%> To Bring Out <S%G1627><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sick, <S%G772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Put <S%G5087><s%> Them On <S%G1909><s%> Beds <S%G2825><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Couches, <S%G2895><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Coming <S%G2064><s%> Of Peter <S%G4074><s%> At Least <S%G2579><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Shadow <S%G4639><s%> Might Overshadow <S%G1982><s%> Some One <S%G5100><s%> Of Them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G4905><s%> And Came Together <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Multitude <S%G4128><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Round About <S%G4038><s%> Cities <S%G4172><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> Bringing <S%G5342><s%> Sick Ones <S%G772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those Beset <S%G3791><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> Unclean. <S%G169><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> Were Healed <S%G2323><s%> All. <S%G537><s%>

<S%G450><s%> And Having Risen Up <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> High Priest <S%G749><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Is The <S%G5607><s%> Sect <S%G139><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Sadducees, <S%G4523><s%> Were Filled <S%G4130><s%> With Anger, <S%G2205><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Laid <S%G1911><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Apostles <S%G652><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Put <S%G5087><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Hold <S%G5084><s%> Public. <S%G1219><s%>

<S%G32><s%> But An Angel <S%G1161><s%> Of The Lord <S%G2962><s%> During <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Night <S%G3571><s%> Opened <S%G455><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Doors <S%G2374><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Prison, <S%G5438><s%> <S%G1806><s%> And Having Brought Out <S%G5037><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%>

Go Ye, <S%G4198><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Standing <S%G2476><s%> Speak <S%G2980><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G2411><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Words <S%G4487><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Life <S%G2222><s%> This. <S%G3778><s%>

<S%G191><s%> And Having Heard <S%G1161><s%> They Entered <S%G1525><s%> At <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dawn <S%G3722><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple, <S%G2411><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Were Teaching. <S%G1321><s%> <S%G3854><s%> But Having Come <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> High Priest <S%G749><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> They Called Together <S%G4779><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sanhedrim <S%G4892><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elderhood <S%G1087><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> Of Israel, <S%G2474><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sent <S%G649><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prison <S%G1201><s%> To Have <S%G71><s%> Them Brought. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G1161><s%> Officers <S%G5257><s%> Having Come <S%G3854><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Did Find <S%G2147><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prison; <S%G5438><s%> <S%G390><s%> And Having Returned <S%G1161><s%> They Reported, <S%G518><s%>

<S%G3004><s%> Saying, <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Prison <S%G1201><s%> We Found <S%G2147><s%> Shut <S%G2808><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Security, <S%G803><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Keepers <S%G5441><s%> Without <S%G1854><s%> Standing <S%G2476><s%> Before <S%G4253><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Doors; <S%G2374><s%> <S%G455><s%> But Having Opened, <S%G1161><s%> Within <S%G2080><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> We Found. <S%G2147><s%>

And <S%G5613><s%> When <S%G1161><s%> They Heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3056><s%> These Words <S%G5128><s%> Both <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G5037><s%> Priest <S%G2409><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Captain <S%G4755><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G2411><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Priests <S%G749><s%> Were Perplexed <S%G1280><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G5101><s%> What <S%G302><s%> Might Be <S%G1096><s%> This. <S%G5124><s%>

<S%G3854><s%> But Having Come <S%G1161><s%> A Certain One <S%G5100><s%> Reported <S%G518><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3004><s%> Saying, <S%G3754><s%> , Lo, <S%G2400><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Ye Put <S%G5087><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prison <S%G5438><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G2411><s%> Standing <S%G2476><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Teaching <S%G1321><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People. <S%G2992><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Having Gone <S%G565><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Captain <S%G4755><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Officers <S%G5257><s%> Brought <S%G71><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Violence, <S%G970><s%> They Feared <S%G5399><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People, <S%G2992><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> They <S%G3361><s%> Might Not Be Stoned. <S%G3034><s%>

<S%G71><s%> And Having Brought <S%G1161><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> They Set Them <S%G2476><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sanhedrim. <S%G4892><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Asked <S%G1905><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> High Priest, <S%G749><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> By A Charge <S%G3852><s%> Did We Charge <S%G3853><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Teach <S%G1321><s%> In <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> This Name? <S%G5129><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> , Lo, <S%G2400><s%> Ye Have Filled <S%G4137><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> With <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1322><s%> Your Teaching, <S%G5216><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Purpose <S%G1014><s%> To Bring <S%G1863><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Blood <S%G129><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of This <S%G444><s%> Man. <S%G5127><s%>

<S%G611><s%> But Answering <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Apostles <S%G652><s%> , Said, <S%G2036><s%> To Obey <S%G3980><s%> It Is Necessary <S%G1163><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Rather <S%G3123><s%> Than <S%G2228><s%> Men. <S%G444><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Fathers <S%G3962><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> Raised Up <S%G1453><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Killed, <S%G1315><s%> Having Hanged <S%G2910><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> A Tree. <S%G3586><s%>

Him <S%G5126><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> A Chief <S%G747><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Saviour <S%G4990><s%> Exalted <S%G5312><s%> By The <S%G3588><s%> Right Hand <S%G1188><s%> Of Him, <S%G846><s%> To Give <S%G1325><s%> Repentance <S%G3341><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Israel <S%G2474><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Remission <S%G859><s%> Of Sins. <S%G266><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Are <S%G2070><s%> Of Him <S%G846><s%> Witness <S%G3144><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Things <S%G4487><s%> These, <S%G5130><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Also <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy, <S%G40><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> To Those <S%G3588><s%> That Obey <S%G3980><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>
But <S%G3588><s%> They <S%G1161><s%> Having Heard <S%G191><s%> Were Cut To The Heart <S%G1282><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Took Counsel <S%G1011><s%> To Put To Death <S%G337><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

Having Risen Up <S%G450><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> A Certain Man <S%G5100><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sanhedrim <S%G4892><s%> A Pharisee, <S%G5330><s%> By Name <S%G3686><s%> Gamaliel, <S%G1059><s%> A Teacher Of The Law, <S%G3547><s%> Honoured <S%G5093><s%> By All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People, <S%G2992><s%> Commanded <S%G2753><s%> Out <S%G1854><s%> For A Short <S%G1024><s%> While <S%G5100><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Apostles <S%G652><s%> To Put, <S%G4160><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And Said <S%G5037><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> Israelites, <S%G2475><s%> Take Heed <S%G4337><s%> To Yourselves <S%G1438><s%> As Regards <S%G1909><s%> These <S%G3588><s%> <S%G444><s%> Men <S%G5125><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Ye Are About <S%G3195><s%> To Do; <S%G4238><s%>
